content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Love both dining in and getting takeout from BCD. Their side dishes are so delicious (you get an entire fish to yourself!) and the tofu soup doesn't disappoint. You usually hear a lot of Korean being spoken among the customers, which to me is a good sign. A reliable standby whenever I'm craving Korean food!
